rows.label: xs05060100_MSG0001
rows.name: Um, hey... Is everything all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05060100_MSG0002
rows.name: Relax! Tatsu here to help![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05060100_MSG0003
rows.name: Nooo! More aliens![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05060100_MSG0004
rows.name: And look! They've got food, too! Nopon takeout, yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05060100_MSG0005
rows.name: Meh! Tatsu is not takeout or food![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05060100_MSG0006
rows.name: Humans are personnel to assist Tatsu.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05060100_MSG0007
rows.name: Personnel?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05060100_MSG0008
rows.name: Ah! No, Tatsu mean... Personnel...favorites![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05060100_MSG0009
rows.name:
Then...humans are friendly?
Humans are not working with the Ganglion?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05060100_MSG0010
rows.name: Sorry for the scare.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05060100_MSG0011
rows.name:
We're from a planet called Earth—
the Ganglion are enemies to us as well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05060100_MSG0012
rows.name:
Enemies, you say?
That means you're friends to the Ma-non, yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05060100_MSG0013
rows.name: We are Ma-non, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05060100_MSG0014
rows.name:
Ours is an advanced civilization. You can tell, right?
The Ganglion desire our technology.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05060100_MSG0015
rows.name:
But Earth human heroes have come to save us, right?
I'm right, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05060100_MSG0016
rows.name:
I hope so... 
Why don't one of you tell us what happened?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05060100_MSG0017
rows.name:
Ooh! Ooh! Okay, I got this one!
Let me answer this one, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05060100_MSG0018
rows.name: So this is where we are now, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05060100_MSG0019
rows.name:
Our ship is hiding in that big crevasse.
Under the fog and stuff—you follow?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05060100_MSG0022
rows.name:
But the Ganglion have it surrounded
with anti-aircraft turrets, you see?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05060100_MSG0023
rows.name:
Okay, so in other words,
if we can destroy their weapons, your ship can escape.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05060100_MSG0024
rows.name:
Exactly! They have three turrets
set up around the area—you see them now?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05060100_MSG0025
rows.name: We need you to destroy them all, okay? Please?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05060100_MSG0026
rows.name:
Got it. We don't want the Ganglion
controlling the airspace here any more than you do.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05060100_MSG0027
rows.name: We'd be happy to help out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05060100_MSG0028
rows.name:
You mean it? You'll help us?!
Oh, thank you, thank you, thank you![ST:wait ]
